statements: UPDATE elected_officials SET position = 'Governor' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE elected_officials SET name = 'John Doe', government_level = 'State' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE elected_officials SET name = 'John Doe', position = 'President' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE elected_officials SET government_level = 'National', contact_info = '{"email": "jane.smith@example.com", "phone": "123-456-7890"}' WHERE name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE officials SET contact_info = '123-456-7890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE government_levels SET description = 'Handles policies and regulations' WHERE level_name = 'State';
UPDATE officials SET contact_info='555-1234' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE government_levels SET level_name='State Executive' WHERE level_id=3;
UPDATE elected_officials SET title='Senator', level_of_government='Federal' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE government_positions SET position_name='Governor' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE elected_officials SET title = 'Senator', level_of_government = 'Federal' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE contact_information SET phone_number = '555-1234', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE official_id = 1;
UPDATE elected_officials SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', contact_info='john.doe@example.com' WHERE elected_official_id=1;
UPDATE federal_officials SET party_affiliation='Republican', office_location='Washington D.C.' WHERE federal_official_id=2;
UPDATE elected_officials SET first_name='John', last_name='Smith', contact_info='john.smith@example.com' WHERE elected_official_id = 1;
UPDATE federal_officials SET party_affiliation='Democratic Party', office_location='Washington D.C.' WHERE federal_official_id = 1;
UPDATE elected_officials SET name='John Doe', contact_number='123-456-7890' WHERE official_id=1;
UPDATE federal_officials SET contact_email='johndoe@example.com', state='California' WHERE official_id=3;
UPDATE elected_officials SET position = 'Mayor' WHERE official_id = 1;
UPDATE state_officials SET contact_address = '123 Main Street, Springfield, IL' WHERE official_id = 3;
